title: Tunisian victory
creator_credit: United States. Army. Signal Corps and British Army Film Unit
brief_description: The final campaign of the War in North Africa, compiled from official films. Shows the main events from the Allied landings at Casablanca, Algiers and Oran on 8th November 1942 to the fall of Tunis and Bizerte on 7th May 1943 and the final mass surrender.
